news.title: Config Sync & Java Detection Improvements
news.description: We've refined the syncing logic! Modpack configurations are now strictly enforced while preserving your personal config files. We've also added built-in Java detection to guide you if Java is missing.

news.title: NAIZO Launcher v1.0.8 Released!
news.description: The new launcher is now available with improved performance, modern design, and auto-update support.
